ada katha­ra­gama wanda­nawe pami­nena bathi­ma­thu­ngen bahu­tha­ra­yakma parani siri­thwi­ri­thwa­lata payin gasa hora paren gos dewi­yan wandi­mata purudu wi sitithi. 1821 di dewa­rakma katha­ra­gama wanda­nawe pamini bawa kiyana ingrisi jathika waidya­wa­ra­yeku wana jon dewi mahatha pawasa aththe thaman katha­ra­gama wanda­nawe pamini bawath ee pamini awastha deke­dima katha­ra­gama dewi­yan wandi­mata yamata thamanta manik ganga thara­naya kiri­mata sidu wu bawathya.
eheth sama­ngiya samaya gana sala­ki­li­math wiya yuthayi.

kotas welenda pola kuda wu wita ee sandaha samagamwalata ha pudgalayanta kala haki balapam wadi wana bawath merata kotas welenda pola ema thaththwayata goduru nowi aarthika prawanatha wadath ihala thalayakata genayame lakshana pennum kara athayi da ee mahatha kiya.kotas welenda pola me ayurin ihala pragdhanikaranayak kara gaman karanne aayojakayan samagam kerehi athi karaganna wishwasaya menma samastha aarthikaya kerehi athi karaganna wishwasaya nisa bawa da ee mahatha kiya.esema rata abhyantharayen menma antharjathika washayen da diyunu aarthikayak kara yamata athi doratu wiwara wi athi bawath eya langa kara ganima apage wagakimak bawath ee mahatha kiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

sancharaka ha adhyapana wisa yoda ganimin dubayi ha malesiyawa athulu ratawalata rakiya sandaha pitathwa yamen walakina lesa shri lanka widesha sewa niyukthi karyanshaya mahajanathawagen illimak karayi..melesa rakiya sandaha pudgalayin yawime jawaramak heli kara ganimata widesha sewa niyukthi karyanshaya samathwa thibena athara puwathpathwala danwim pala karamin, sancharaka ha adhyapana sandaha pudgalayin widesha gathakarana muwawen widesha rakiya sandaha piris yomukara owun ee ee ratawala atharaman karana bawata thorathuru labi thibena bawada widesha sewa niyukthi karyanshaye sabhapathi amal senalankadhikara mahatha pawasayi.ee hethuwen mewani jawaramkaruwan pilibandawa karyanshaye wishesha wimarshana anshaya mangin parikshana pawathwana bawada ee mahatha sandahan karayi.pasugiya kalaya purawata mewani nithi wirodhi kriyawan rasak anawaranaya kara ganimata karyanshaye wishesha wimarshana eekakayata hakiyawa labi thibena bawa sihipath karana amal senalankadhikara mahatha melesa sancharaka ho adhyapana wisa mangin nithi wirodhiwa widesha gathawi rakiyawala niratha wime di siduwana karadarayanta karyanshaya kisindu lesakin ho waga nokiyana bawada awadharanaya karayi .esema mewani kuta wyaparikayinta hasuwimen mudal ha lingika surakamata owun lakwana bawada ewani wanchanika kriyawan sandaha kisindu lesakin aadhara upakara laba nodena lesada hethema illa siti .

al kuranaya ha hadisayan ehi mulashrayan we,islam dahama adahana janaya muslim yanuwen hadunwayi.muslim warun eekiya asamasama dewiwarayek wishwasha karayi,[1]ee wagema islam dahama aadikalpitha dahamak lesath aabraham ,mosas ,yesus nabi warun lesath hadunwayi,[2]owun ge pasukalina anugamikayan wisin kalayath samaga dahama wikurthi kara athi bawathya,[3]ee nisa awasana washayen al kuranaya helidarawu kerunu[4] bawa muslim warun wishwasha karayi .islamaya sampurna jiwana salasmak lesa hadunwayi.[5][6] bahuthara muslim waru sunni(75–90%) ha shiya(10–20%) kotas walata ayithi we .13% pamana muslim warun indunisiyawe jiwath we.dakunu aasiyawe 25 % k da ,mada peradiga 20 % k da upa sahara aprikawe 15% sitithi.aasanna washayen biliyana 1.57 pramanayak hewath 23 % k pamana mulu lowama siti .islamaya dewani wishalathama ha lowa wegayen wardhanaya wana dahamaki 2 islam ithihasaya 3 islam dina darshanaya 4 kalifa rajadhaniye nagima (kri.
